website_summaries.verdict: A durable choice for buyers who need a sectional to fit in the corner of compact yards and patios.
pros: Sofa comes with 2 end pieces for resting arms or drinks
Extremely comfortable for a relatively inexpensive price
cons: Table does not come with glass cover
Some buyers wish the set were taller

customer_reviews.title: Great outdoor set for the price
customer_reviews.text: This arrived quickly and was very well packaged. I was surprised something so large could fit into three boxes. The quality is great and the cushions are comfortable. I was worried it would be a little large on the deck but the measurements are spot on and this thing looks fantastic on the deck. It sits low to the ground but I don't hate it at all, it's very comfortable. I can't wait to enjoy it throughout the spring and summer.
customer_reviews.author: LMatt

customer_reviews.title: Best quality for price - really nice set - sturdy - attractive - great customer service!!
customer_reviews.text: GREAT quality. Came already assembled (LOVE THAT). Fast, friendly customer service (day 1 - three pieces arrived day 2 - the next 2 pieces arrived - missing a seat cushion, emails were promptly replied-to & the cushion arrived a few days later - THANK YOU Luis!) This is the best buy for the price and I shopped a LOT.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Rogers

customer_reviews.title: it looked fine and sits very comfortably
customer_reviews.text: A little shocked to see how short it was....lol...but after putting it out, it looked fine and sits very comfortably! So happy to finally have a sectional that is affordable...also nothing to do but take it out of the box and put the cushions on once you've removed the plastic!
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Ann Herby

customer_reviews.title: That was the great thing about it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set because I didn't want to deal with assembling it. That was the great thing about it, they were already assembled. I just took them out of the box and set them up. I was however a bit dissatisfied with the quality of the cushions,they are not very comfortable and I think a little on the cheap side considering the price of the set. I would also like to find a tarp or cover for it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We have been very pleased with this set
customer_reviews.text: We have been very pleased with this set. Especially loved that it came completely assembled and was delivered very quickly I sprayed the cushions with Scotchgard for some extra protection from spills. It is very comfortable and we love that it can seat so many in the same amount of space that we previously could only seat 3. Our patio is covered so sun exposure is not a problem for us. I would buy it again in a heartbeat.
customer_reviews.author: Marlene Turnblom

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful surprise. 3 sizable boxes with the entire 6 ...
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful surprise. 3 sizable boxes with the entire 6 piece set carefully and precisely packaged. Already assembled, how wonderful!! Excellent quality. The pieces sit lower than you might expect but this is a real bonus, trust me. Cushions are comfortably firm so being a little thinner is fine. The clips that keep the pieces together go on easily enough and work very well. I would highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love my patio more
customer_reviews.text: Love my new patio furniture. It's sturdy, well built and the cushions are very comfortable. It cmes with connectors to keep the pieces together but I recommend purchasing additional connectors.
customer_reviews.author: Clifton Ballard

customer_reviews.title: great value
customer_reviews.text: About 6 months old, looks amazing. we use it infrequently but one of the cushions is coming slightly unraveled at a seam. Everyone who sees it seems to love it. I have slept on it a few times on our screened porch. Heavenly! Not high end but for the price point very nice.
customer_reviews.author: con plu

customer_reviews.title: This was the perfect outdoor furniture piece for our sun room
customer_reviews.text: This was the perfect outdoor furniture piece for our sun room. We actually oriented it into 4 pieces on one side and 1 piece on the end making a long "L" shape. The quality is fantastic, it's comfortable, and stacks so well for when we will store it in the wintertime. Very happy with what we received at such a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Janelle

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Looks great and has lasted 3 years and still looking like new. We always get compliments on it from guest.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality / Rusts Easily
customer_reviews.text: After being out in two rain storms, the product frame has already begun to rust and leave stains on my deck. I would not purchase this product again. very poor quality. Company was responsive to my concerns and willing to work with me to make things right.
customer_reviews.author: Oakk30

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful sophisticated look and feel
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful sophisticated look and feel. I live in Vail Colorado and needed something beautiful and durable. This was perfect. m
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ashby

customer_reviews.title: Love the quality
customer_reviews.text: Love the quality. Cushions seem durable. The only reason I didn't give it 5 stars is the table shouldn't be called a table. It is so low it's more like a foot rest. It's a shame because if it was a little higher it would be a great set.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfect in the backyard and is very easy to put ...
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfect in the backyard and is very easy to put together and take apart if you want to move around and make new spots to sit.
customer_reviews.author: A.K.

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful furniture at an incredible price. Shipped promptly and as described. Very happy with product and merchant.
customer_reviews.author: P. Pontzer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I initially was very impressed with this product but have since been very disappointed. The plastic wicker is breaking & falling apart. I did purchase it 2 years ago but expected it to have a longer life than that.
customer_reviews.author: Amybeth7

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I didn not give it five stars is because not sue about the longevity of this product. It wasn easy to assemble, looks great. I am very happy.
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: btw it’s good product not the missing cushion part at all
customer_reviews.text: I just got my furniture but it’s missing cushion?? I believe that happen to of the customer now when I’m gonna get I hope not next year in the case probably take it back give me my money back.. btw it’s good product not the missing cushion part at all...
customer_reviews.author: Ben chavez

customer_reviews.title: Very nice.
customer_reviews.text: Much better than I'd hoped, very nice for our small patio area.
customer_reviews.author: D. Gill

customer_reviews.title: Awesome set....what about a cover?
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I bought it with the very low expectation of it being too low as most people have pointed out. It is a bit low but not nearly as bad as everyone made it out to be. There are cheaper sets out there but this one seems to be made a bit better than those...the cushions in particular seem to be of high quality. With that said, does anyone know where to get a cover for this set??? I know I will likely have to piece something together. Just wondering if anyone has a solution that they have used???
customer_reviews.author: john baker

customer_reviews.title: Received this set today and it arrived in perfect condition. It looks great and really finishes off ...
customer_reviews.text: Received this set today and it arrived in perfect condition. It looks great and really finishes off my sunroom :)
customer_reviews.author: Off Leash K9 Training - Raleigh / Durham

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love my new set. Very comfortable, spending many happy hours on my deck now.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: purchased one and loved it so much that I ordered another set for ...
customer_reviews.text: purchased one and loved it so much that I ordered another set for a second patio. The cushions are very comfortable, and it was easy to install. The weave of the furniture is strong and thus far I haven't had any issues with the material coming apart or seperating. The set is store under a covered patio so I can't really comment on fading of the cushions. I like that the cushions can be removed for washing, this was an important reason for purchasing this set.
customer_reviews.author: Lg

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: good quality and construction. comfortable. sits a little close to the ground but very nice set
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my patio!
customer_reviews.text: I shopped a LOT!! And finally settled on this one because I didn't have to put it together and it came with the clips. It's awesome!! Comfortable and beautiful!! Arrived without one seat cushion and they shipped it out fast!! I would recommend to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: netgarcia02

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Trying to find a way to stop the pillows from tipping over from the wind.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Dillon

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and already assembled
customer_reviews.text: Awesome awesome awesome! Came put together which was a huge plus. Very comfy and perfect for what we were looking forward. Not high end fancy but exactly what we expected given the price, highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Arsenault

customer_reviews.title: Very nice people to deal with
customer_reviews.text: Very well made and packaged with lots of bubble wrap. Box matl was very heavy duty and delivered on time. HOWEVER, it is the size for a children. The actual hard wicker seat is only 12 inches tall....add the cushion 4 inch....and the complete seat height is 16 inches. I'm only 5'5" and it LOOKS very short. I only needed to open one box (comes in 3 boxes) to immediately note I don't want something this "funny" looking. I require a correct looking sectional. The company by phone said their furniture runs small. Very nice people to deal with. Great price.
customer_reviews.author: Rochelle Lavoix

customer_reviews.title: Grat buy
customer_reviews.text: We have a covered patio and have been looking for a reasonably priced sectional unit this is the one. It came with the frame connectors to keep the sections from coming apart. Yes it is a lower backed unit but it just as comfortable as any I have sat in in stores costing 40% more. The cushions are firm so you don't bottom out when you are seated and hold there shape. The cushion material is very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Terrance Perrin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this on our patio...my only suggestion would be Velcro or some kind of attachment for the back cushions...
customer_reviews.author: Fran59

customer_reviews.title: Great furniture, just pull it out of the boxes
customer_reviews.text: Great furniture! Very comfortable and extremely simple to set up. Just took it out of box and put it on the patio.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived the next day!! All assembled; just put on cushions and clips. Looks amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Tanja S.

customer_reviews.title: Looks very nice. Delivery was extremely fast
customer_reviews.text: Looks very nice. Delivery was extremely fast. Absolutely no building of furniture. Just take out and clip sectional fasteners together and arrange cushions. A very great product for the price
customer_reviews.author: laura morgan

customer_reviews.title: Not very comfortable..
customer_reviews.text: Gets wet and stays wet for days... Not very comfortable... Smaller than you think it will be... Not in any way worth the money... I have already begun to replace mine...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Such a great deal for this outdoor sectional
customer_reviews.text: Such a great deal for this outdoor sectional. I have it in my sun room and it looks awesome! Really happy I decided to purchase this, I was worried about buying online- but the product exceeded my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: katie

customer_reviews.title: I was disappointed in that feature - but
customer_reviews.text: The furniture is very short and won't do well for anyone very tall. I was disappointed in that feature - but, the quality still looks nice.
customer_reviews.author: Tammi Veater

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: As other reviews have stated, this patio set sits low, but the quality of the pillows and wicker are well with the price! It looks great on my patio, and the firm pillows will provide comfortable sitting for our guests when we entertain!
customer_reviews.author: jshea3

customer_reviews.title: Great patio furniture.
customer_reviews.text: Furniture is great. Very comfortable. Had a slight tear in one of the cushions and they sent me TWO replacement cushions.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny P.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble - very comfy
customer_reviews.text: We have only had the pieces about 2 months, but so far they have been fabulous. Easy to assemble - very comfy!!!
customer_reviews.author: LOJ

customer_reviews.title: I really like this furniture set
customer_reviews.text: I really like this furniture set. One piece was bent, I sent an email and within a few days they sent me a replacement seat. It was well packed and no construction required...just clip them together in the configuration you desire. Very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Shop mom

customer_reviews.title: Great Set
customer_reviews.text: Liked the look and comfort. Big hit at our 4th July party. Would definitely recommend. Comes with clips to prevent movement of individual sections.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Neil Galli

customer_reviews.title: The set looks great and is very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: The set looks great and is very comfortable. Everyone loves how it looks. The cushions are thick and feel sturdy and easy to clean. I am very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great, if like me you have a small space ...
customer_reviews.text: Great, if like me you have a small space or simply refuse to pay well over what patio furniture should cost.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Jay Carrigan

customer_reviews.title: Great Outdoor Couch
customer_reviews.text: Like everyone has said it is good quality for a good price. Very comfortable, cushions seem durable. Only problem is no arm rests, I just got throw pillows.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice set especially for the price! Comfortable, nicely shipped & easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Brenner

customer_reviews.title: Lovely, sturdy, and great customer service!
customer_reviews.text: I receive a ton of compliments on this and we use it daily in our three season room! I had an issue with on of the end pieces and the customer service of this seller is rediculously amazing. Their whole team was great and was able to help me quickly!
customer_reviews.author: ItsMeAmanda

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love it. Smaller than I expected but very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Christine B Drake

customer_reviews.title: Great Outdoor sectional
customer_reviews.text: Great outdoor sectional sofa set. I like that you can change the layout, we currently use it in an L shape. It was well packaged in 3 large heavy boxes, no real assembly required, take it out of the box and set it up. I used scotch-guard on the cushions which seems to help deflect the water, but I recommend covering up the sofa or storing the cushions when it rains. Overall we love the set and would recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: I love it! It's very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: A few of the pieces do not sit flush with the ground and require shims. I also wish it came up higher off the ground. Other than that, I love it! It's very comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Riveridgional

product_meta.title: Christopher Knight Home Santa Cruz Outdoor Wicker Sectional Sofa Set with Water Resistant Cushions, 6-Pcs Set, Brown
product_meta.description: At Great Deal Furniture, we want to help you make your outdoor space The perfect gathering place for family & friends. Our reddington outdoor patio furniture 6Piece sectional sofa set is an excellent seating option for any alfresco location. Our 100% polyester cushions are both comfortable & water-resistant which helps protect them from the elements & also makes this set a great pool-side seating option. This set comes with 1 corner section, 2 armless chairs, 2 wicker endpiece, & a table. The dark brown wicker & creamy beige cushions go well with any decor & accessories. Feel free to mix & match outdoor decorative pillows to add a Pop Of Color. No matter where you put this sectional furniture set, You’ll Love the way it makes your outdoor space feel a little more like home.
feature_bullets: 6-Piece sofa set: our 6-piece sofa set with cushions will meet all your outdoor furniture needs. This high-class lounge set includes a 5-piece sectional with 1 corner section, 2 armless chairs, and 2 end pieces, and a small triangular Wicker Table with one round edge. It fits perfectly with the l-shaped sofa.

Water-resistant cushions: at Great Deal Furniture, we bring you the best outdoor furniture available. Our large Beige polyester seat cushions, which fit perfectly on our Wicker sectional, are made of a tough, yet soft, water-resistant fabric. This gives them protection from weather elements without needing an additional cover. The cushions Are removable and washable.

High-quality wicker: to give your space A classic Bay feel, we created our reddington furniture set with durable, faux Wicker that is easy to Care for and built to last. The black-brown Wicker makes up the base of the sofa, which is the same material as the table and end pieces.

Deck, balcony & more: Our Wicker conversation set is the perfect addition to any backyard or space outside. Use on a lawn, deck, front or back porch, in a sunroom or garden, or near a pool, outdoor Bar, or BBQ pit. If you use this couch set by the pool, its durable fabric will help prevent water damage caused by wet swimsuits and splashing. Adults and kids alike will love this new sectional.

Dimensions: each Wicker end piece is 35" L x 30.50" W x 26" H. The armless sectional pieces are 30.50" L x 26.50" W x 26" H each. The large corner piece of the sectional is 30.50" L x 30.50" W x 26" H. The classic wicker Table is 30.50" L x 30.50" W x 11.5" H. You’ll always have plenty of comfortable seats for your friends and family to sit and relax. Some assembly required. Includes 11 beige cushions.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars73 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
